20698.<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「貴:

20699.<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「遅:

20701.<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「…:

20705.<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「は:

20706.<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「ザ:

20707.<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「お:
